channel.title: How do i change starter items,weapons,money etc
channel.description: some people say its in player.java...but what do i do with player.java ??

item.title: How do i change starter items,weapons,money etc
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

looks like u need spoonfeedin to be helped, first off open up your source

half way down (ish maybe 3/4) there will be something called “player” now, there will be to! One as a notepad, and one as a cfg file, open up the notepad.

Now you need 2 search for

Unique

Just under it you should see something like this

//Giving the player an unique look playerEquipment[playerHat]=4708; playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; playerEquipment[playerAmulet]=6585; playerEquipment[playerChest]=1117; playerEquipment[playerShield]=1189; playerEquipment[playerLegs]=1075; playerEquipment[playerHands]=775; playerEquipment[playerFeet]=1837; playerEquipment[playerRing]=-1; playerEquipment[playerArrows]=-1; playerEquipment[playerWeapon]=1321;

Now, if you look closly, at the end it has 3 or 4 numbers, this is the item id of what they are wearing, so for example on

playerEquipment[playerCape]=1052; See where it says 1052? This means when u log in it will be wearing a legands cape.

Hope this helps,
~johno

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change starter items,weapons,money etc
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

starter as in… what you wear when you login?? im not going to spoonfeed you.

  1. player.java, search id, change or delete.

starter as in… the command starter??

search in client.java, delete or change.
